name: Heavy Grinner
raw:
</font><font color=#009B00>

This Instruction Manual will teach you how to assemble a:
  'Heavy Grinner'
 The Construction kit. must be between Quality Level  81 and  100.
 All other pieces must be of AT LEAST that level range... 
 Add them using shift+right-click.
  Add in following order:
 
  1. Pistol Weapons Construction Kit. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  324 ->  400
 
  2. Notum Enriched Nano Paste - 1x Layer. SkillTo Assemble: Nano Progra:  122 ->  150
 
  3. Composite Barrel. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  304 ->  375
 
  4. Lock and Stock. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  324 ->  400
 
  5. Explosion Propulsion Containment Chamber. SkillTo Assemble: Mech. Engi:  284 ->  350
 
  6. Nano Pylon. SkillTo Assemble: Mech. Engi:  202 ->  250
 
  7. Self-Cleaning KO-CR Device. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  284 ->  350
 
  8. Notum Enriched Nano Paste - 2x Layer. SkillTo Assemble: Nano Progra:  162 ->  200
 
  9. Notum Alloy Strengthened Ribs. SkillTo Assemble: Mech. Engi:  202 ->  250
 
  10. Notum Alloy Strengthened Ribs. SkillTo Assemble: Mech. Engi:  202 ->  250
 
  11. Triple Pulse Enabler. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  344 ->  425
 
  12. Nano Pylon. SkillTo Assemble: Mech. Engi:  202 ->  250
